verses.name: Joshua 21:32
verses.text: And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Hammoth–dor with her suburbs, and Kartan with her suburbs; three cities.

verses.name: Joshua 21:33
verses.text: All the cities of the Gershonites according to their families were thirteen cities with their suburbs.

verses.name: Joshua 21:34
verses.text: And unto the families of the children of Merari, the rest of the Levites, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Jokneam with her suburbs, and Kartah with her suburbs,

verses.name: Joshua 21:35
verses.text: Dimnah with her suburbs, Nahalal with her suburbs; four cities.
